content: Hi @rahul garg , what HL7 standard are you referring to? V2 messaging? CDA? FHIR?
i didn't use any standard yet. Please suggest how i can start with HL7. as i don't have enough knowledge about hl7 implementation.

The first question will be: what are you trying to achieve? Which kinds of data are you looking to encode as HL7? With what systems/applications/apps are you seeking to exchange data? Which country are you in, what legal framework (if any) requires you to use a HL7 standard?
There are many HL7 standards, as such we'll first have to determine which one (if any) is the best match with your requirements.

fyi, there is an online course on HL7 Fundementals startimg next week. Looks like registration is still open.
http://www.hl7.org/events/elearning.cfm?ref=nav
